roleset.name: giving/taking on bodily form

example.name: arg1 and TMP
example.text: What I do n't recall is anything , legal or otherwise , that was ever built right in its first incarnation .

example.name: args 0, 1
example.text: Disney also used this for their incarnation of Hans Christian Andersen 's " the Little Mermaid " .

propbank.arg: of Hans Christian Andersen 's " the Little Mermaid "

example.name: believers as arg0
example.text: In India , the ancient story of the Hindu religion is that Rama , their incarnation of God , was fighting against Ravana , who ruled over Sri Lanka , Ceylon , and was nothing but the devil incarnate .

example.name: args 1, 2
example.text: The Noor is an aspect of the Ismaili belief in the concept of God 's incarnation as a human being living incognito among human beings on this earth .

propbank.arg: as a human being living incognito among human beings on this earth

roleset.note: INCARNATION-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, comparison to 'reincarnate-v.01. No VNcls. (from incarnation.01-n)
